short_summary: DUE Date: 12-January-2023 \\ Service Recurrent  \\ Internal Finaliser
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is seeking proposals from consultunts to provide  Building Condition Reports,List of the pre-qualified firms invited that qualified under the Architectural Supply Arrangement E0291-145744 in no particular order are as follows:\\ Nine Yards Inc.\\ Groupe Leclerc Architecture & Design  \\ Fougere Menchenton Architecture Inc. \\ Gibbons Snow Architects Inc. \\  10-Day RFP notice submitted on 09 January 2023 by Ms. Rachel Miller, , contract number awarded soon Beider result or difussion notice.
